name: Project Vita
description:
Gather all the gems, make new friends and overcome many obstacles! Check out the Trailer

dynamic super cool advanced moving platforms!!!!!!!

~~ disappearing platforms ~~

¡ ¡ ¡ ¡ PUSHY WIGGLY DUDES ¡ ¡ ¡ ¡

Controls 

(Keyboard / Controller)

Arrow keys / Left Joystick: Movement

X or UP/A: Jump or Select

Z/X: Activate button

R/Select: Restart to Checkpoint 

Q: Delete save

Credits

Coding, Level Designs, & Music by: @Vossel

Sound Effects & Enemy designs by: @Pigeongoth

(Make sure to show her some love for her great work!!) Socials Twitter Patreon Youtube I hope you guys enjoy the game!
